#include<stdio.h>

int main()
{
static int i,j,k,prime[100000],a[100000],t,n,start;
long long res;
for(i=3;i*i<100000;i+=2)
if(a[i]==0)
for(j=3;i*j<100000;j+=2)
a[i*j]=1;

prime[0]=1,prime[1]=2,k=2;
for(i=3;i<100000;i+=2)
if(a[i]==0)
prime[k++]=i;
prime[k]=100005;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
if(k==0) {res=n;printf("%lld\n",res*(res-1)/2);continue;}
if(k>9593) {printf("0\n");continue;}
//start=(n%2==0)?a[n-1]:a[n];
res=0,i=1;
while(prime[k]<=n)
{
res+=(prime[i]-prime[i-1])*(n-prime[k]+1);
i++;
k++;
}
printf("%lld\n",res);
}


return 0;
}
